snippet: Dave Schools, the bass player for the band Widespread Panic, is a large guy with long hair, not much of a terror threat. He appreciates an extra dessert.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features Widespread Panic bass player Dave Schools discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: Dave Schools, the bass player for the band Widespread Panic, is a large guy with long hair, not much of a terror threat. He appreciates an extra dessert.
